summary.Title: IT-adviser – Aalborg
summary.Presentation: Bone Consult is a minor but highly ambitious IT-consultant house, with unique qualifications and more than 25 years of experience with IT infrastructure, Cloud, ERP solutions, and business developm

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Bone Consult is a minor but highly ambitious IT-consultant house, with unique qualifications and more than 25 years of experience with IT infrastructure, Cloud, ERP solutions, and business development. Primarily our work is with medium-sized businesses. We have developed our own private Cloud. A solution we won an award for by the SVC Awards in London.

Bone Consult is increasing and has won the Gazelle business award in 2018 and 2019. We value professional competency highly likewise do we value education. It’s a must that you have the desire to learn and improve your qualifications within our technology and our work. We will be working with the newest technologies. Furthermore, we support our clients so that they can explore the potential of IT and digitalization. We, as a business, want to have the best advisers on the market and have a very interesting client portfolio which consists of clients with long relationships as well as new relations and exciting projects.

We have an informal tone within the business in which high work morale and thriving are a priority. We always put the client first in every move we make. We, therefore, seek you who want to be a part of an amazing team, where the qualifications are in the Premier League but with all the perks of being within a small business and agile in our solutions to the obstacles of the clients.

We offer an exciting and developing job opportunity in an informal and ambitious organization where thoughtfulness, credibility, and propriety, as well as humor, are a priority. We are working dedicated and focused to deliver the best possible experience for the client simultaneously we value a strong professional environment with a great social community. We offer flexibility and great working conditions with a salary that matches the marked.

In the office in Aalborg, we seek an extroverted and credibility-building IT adviser, which include having a flair for understanding businesses and can connect them with the correct It-solution

Tasks:
• A deeper knowledge of network.
• Knowledge about firewalls will be an advantage.
• Design and implementation of IT strategies.
• Microsoft Cloud-based solutions.
• IT security and disaster recovery.

Qualifications:
• Minimum 5 years of experience in design and operation of IT infrastructure.
• Experience with firewall and switch, from Cisco Meraki. HP Aruba would be an advantage.
• Experience with infrastructure analyses.
• Experience with Microsoft platforms including Azure is a must.
• Experience with VMware and Microsoft Serves in general.
• Egregious business- and process understanding, and the ability to dedicate yourself to the clients’ obstacles.
• A great ability to convey and a trust-building attitude where you thrive with many contacts and collaboration relations.
• A strong project leader with great responsibility and independents who finish the product with high quality.
• That you are curious about nature and keep yourself updated with the technology.
• Good humor and good social skills, internally as well as externally.

If you are interested, we request that you forward your application to job@boneconsult.dk We will be interviewing for the job continuously. If you have further questions regarding the position, contact Ole Nielsen at 6024 8999 or look at our website boneconsult.com
